title:
Fresh & Premium.
High-Quality Mature Coconuts.
content:
Fresh mature coconuts with thick meat and natural rich taste.

Perfect for fresh consumption, traditional culinary use, or processed food businesses. Picked directly from the best farms in Southeast Sulawesi, guaranteed fresh to your hands.
image_alt: Freshly sliced mature coconut with dripping water

title:
Pure & Natural.
Goodness in Every Drop.
content:
Our virgin coconut oil is hygienically processed to keep its natural nutrients.

Great for health, beauty, and cooking, bringing the best quality straight from tropical farms for your family or your business.
image_alt: Bottle of virgin coconut oil with fresh coconuts around

title:
Trusted Quality.
Reliable Industrial Supply.
content: We supply high-quality white copra as a key raw material for cooking oil, cosmetics, and animal feed industries. Made from carefully selected coconuts for the best results.

title:
Sustainable Innovation.
Eco-Friendly Solutions.
content: We use every part of the coconut â€” shells can be turned into high-grade charcoal briquettes and unique handicrafts. An efficient, eco-friendly alternative energy solution.
image_alt: Charcoal briquettes made from coconut shells
